Class EXAPreparedStatement

java.lang.Object
com.exasol.jdbc.ServerCommunication
com.exasol.jdbc.AbstractEXAStatement
com.exasol.jdbc.EXAStatement
com.exasol.jdbc.AbstractEXAPreparedStatement
com.exasol.jdbc.EXAPreparedStatement
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, PreparedStatement, Statement, Wrapper
public class EXAPreparedStatement extends AbstractEXAPreparedStatement
Extends the abstract classes for prepared statements providing JDBC specific functionality.
